title: Bed Cover, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: Field and border solidly filled with flower heads in orange and magenta, narrow blue-green leaf scrolls; floral guard border around center field and edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bed Cover, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-19.
